scripts.dev:pyodide: npm run copy-api && cross-env VITE_PYODIDE=true vite
scripts.postbuild: node -e "if(process.env.GITHUB_PAGES === 'true') { require('fs').copyFileSync('dist/index.html', 'dist/404.html'); console.log('Copied index.html to 404.html for GitHub Pages'); }"
scripts.build:pyodide: npm run copy-api && cross-env VITE_PYODIDE=true vite build
scripts.build:gh-pages: npm run copy-api && cross-env VITE_PYODIDE=true GITHUB_PAGES=true vite build
scripts.prod:pyodide: npm run build:pyodide && npx serve -c serve.json -p 3000
scripts.prod:simple: npm run build:pyodide && npx serve dist -p 3000 -s
scripts.prod:gh-pages: npm run build:gh-pages && npx serve dist -p 3000 -s
